import { Box } from '@mui/material' import { useState } from 'react' import Rating from '../rating' import WishlistBookCard from '../wishlistBookCard' function FooterBookCard(props) { const [isFavorite, setIsFavorite] = useState(props.accessInfo?.pdf) const [isWishlist, setIsWishlist] = useState(props.accessInfo?.pdf) return ( <> {props.authors.length > 0 ? <> {props.authors.map((name, i) => {(i ? ', ' : '') + name} )} :

} {props.title} ) } export default FooterBookCard
